attributes.action: stop the ratifcation of the Lisbon Treaty respecting the Irish vote
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Amendmet 32 of the corbett report on the Lisbon Treaty put before the Eu parliment stated  "2a. Undertakes to respect the outcome of the referendum in Ireland." The tories abstained from the vote, labour and lib dems voted against and UKIP voted for.  following the referendum we demand the Uk stop the ratifaction process and respect the irish vote.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
